name: Modern Chrome Faucet
description: High-quality chrome finish kitchen faucet with pull-out sprayer. Water-efficient design with ceramic disc valves for durability.

name: PVC Plumbing Pipes
description: Durable 1-inch PVC pipes for water supply systems. UV resistant, corrosion-free, and suitable for both hot and cold water.

name: Automatic Water Pump
description: 1HP automatic water pump with pressure control switch. Self-priming, energy-efficient, and suitable for residential water systems.

name: Rain Shower Set
description: Complete shower set with 8-inch rain shower head, hand shower, and thermostatic mixer. Chrome finish with anti-lime system.

name: Modern Toilet Bowl
description: One-piece ceramic toilet bowl with efficient dual-flush system. Water-saving design (3/6L flush) and comfortable height.

name: Plastic Water Tank
description: 1000L polyethylene water storage tank with UV protection. Food-grade material, corrosion-resistant, and easy to install.

name: Professional Pipe Wrench
description: 14-inch professional pipe wrench with adjustable jaw. Drop-forged steel construction with comfortable grip handle.

name: Stainless Steel Sink
description: Double bowl stainless steel kitchen sink with soundproof coating. 18-gauge steel with satin finish and included drain set.

name: Digital Water Meter
description: Smart digital water meter with LCD display and data logging. Measures flow rate and total consumption with high accuracy.

name: PVC Pipe Fittings Kit
description: Assorted PVC pipe fittings kit including elbows, tees, couplings, and adapters. Suitable for 1-inch plumbing systems.

name: Instant Water Heater
description: 50L electric instant water heater with digital temperature control. Thermal cut-off protection and energy-saving mode.

name: Drain Cleaning Solution
description: Professional-grade chemical drain cleaner for clogged pipes. Biodegradable formula safe for all plumbing systems.

name: Precision Pipe Cutter
description: Professional pipe cutter for precise cuts on PVC and copper pipes. Ratchet mechanism for easy operation and clean cuts.

name: Modern Acrylic Bathtub
description: Freestanding acrylic bathtub with non-slip surface. Contemporary design with overflow protection and quick-drain system.

name: Complete Valve Set
description: Professional plumbing valve set including ball valves, check valves, and pressure relief valves. Brass construction with chrome finish.
